DOC.brief_summary: To assess efficacy acute treatment 10 mg/day vortioxetine versus placebo cognitive performance ( focus aspect concern speed processing , executive functioning , attention ) work patient major depressive disorder ( MDD ) .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Vortioxetine Cognitive Dysfunction Working Patients With Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: The patient MDD , diagnose accord Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , 4th edition , Text Revision ( DSMIVTR™ ) recurrent major depressive disorder ( MDD ) ( classification 296.3x ) . The patient MADRS total score ≥26 . The patient current major depressive episode ( MDE ) ≥3 month . The patient age ≥18 ≤65 year . The patient employ full parttime ( define minimum 50 % full time work hour per week ) . Part time work due medical mental illness MDD . The patient current job/position least 3 month . The patient plan change job retire within treatment period . The patient sick leave , Screening Randomisation Visits , plan send patient sick leave . The patient receive disability benefit . Exclusion criterion : The patient score ≥70 DSST ( number correct symbol ) Baseline Visit . The patient , opinion investigator , able complete neuropsychological test validly Baseline Visit . The patient physical , cognitive , language impairment severity adversely affect validity data derive neuropsychological test . The patient diagnose read disability ( dyslexia ) . The patient history lack response previous adequate treatment vortioxetine paroxetine . The patient current psychiatric disorder Axis I disorder ( accord DSMIVTR™ criterion ) MDD , assess use MINI . The patient current diagnosis dysthymic disorder within 3 month precede onset current episode ( DSMIVTR™ criterion ) . The patient borderline , schizotypal , schizoid , paranoid , histrionic , antisocial personality disorder ( axis II ) comorbid primary diagnosis ( DSMIVTR™ criterion ) . The patient suffers personality disorder , mental retardation , pervasive development disorder , attentiondeficit/hyperactivity disorder , organic mental disorder , mental disorder due general medical condition ( DSMIVTR™ criterion ) . The patient current diagnosis history manic hypomanic episode , schizophrenia psychotic disorder , include major depression psychotic feature ( DSMIVTR™ criterion ) . Other protocoldefined inclusion exclusion criterion may apply .
